Object.Name: IPSO Generic Sensor
Object.Description1: This IPSO object allow the description of a generic sensor. It is based on the description of a value and a unit according to the UCUM specification. Thus, any type of value defined within this specification can be reporting using this object. Specific object for a given range of sensors is described later in the document, enabling to identify the type of sensors directly from its Object ID. This object may be used as a generic object if a dedicated one does not exist.

Item.Name: Sensor Value
Item.Description: If present, the value of the sensor.

Item.Name: Units
Item.Description: If present, the type of sensor defined as the UCUM Unit Definition e.g. “Cel” for Temperature in Celcius.

Item.Name: Min Measured Value
Item.Description: The minimum value measured by the sensor since it is ON

Item.Name: Max Measured Value
Item.Description: The maximum value measured by the sensor since it is ON

Item.Name: Min Range Value
Item.Description: The minimum value that can be measured by the sensor

Item.Name: Max Range Value
Item.Description: The maximum value that can be measured by the sensor

Item.Name: Application Type
Item.Description: If present, the application type of the sensor as a string, for instance, “CO2”

Item.Name: Sensor Type
Item.Description: The type of the sensor (for instance PIR type)
